code:
java
## .env.example

# Database
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=spring-boot-jwt-auth
DB_USER=springuser
DB_PASSWORD=springpassword

# Spring Configuration
SPRING_PROFILES.active=dev
SPRING.datasource.url=jdbc:postgresql://${DB_HOST}:${DB_PORT}/${DB_NAME}
SPRING.datasource.username=${DB_USER}
SPRING.datasource.password=${DB_PASSWORD}

# Security
JWT_SECRET_KEY=secretKeyForJwt
JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME=86400000

# Swagger
SWAGGER.enabled=true
SWAGGER.host=localhost
SWAGGER.basePath=/api

# Docker
DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME=spring-boot-jwt-auth
DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME=spring-boot-jwt-auth-container
